description: Create a little meal magic by adding some Bertocchi Double Smoked Leg Ham and Swiss cheese to a crispy chicken schnitzel to take your parmigiana to the next level.
name: Cheesy Ham & Chicken Parmigiana Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 320g Double Smoked Freshly Shaved Bertocchi Ham

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180C/160C fan-forced. Line an oven tray with baking paper. Heat half the oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add half the chicken. Cook for 2 minutes each side or until golden brown. Transfer to prepared tray. Repeat with remaining oil and chicken.
Top chicken with pasta sauce, ham and cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until cooked and golden brown. Season.
Place chicken on serving plates. Sprinkle with basil leaves. Serve with salad.
